snippet: Marfa may be a small, remote town (a seven-hour drive from Austin), but the recent Trans-Pecos Festival shows that it is well on its way to becoming an important music town.
lead_paragraph: Marfa may be a small, remote town (a seven-hour drive from Austin), but the recent Trans-Pecos Festival shows that it is well on its way to becoming an important music town.

headline.main: Tiny, Remote Marfa Poised to Be a Rock-Star Magnet
headline.print_headline: Tiny, Remote Marfa Poised to Be a Rock-Star Magnet
